features: ❅ Small Size & Portable Fan ❅ Designed with the anti-slip handle, Pluralla personal fan is very easy and comfortable to hold even by small hands. Comes with a stable base and lanyard, you can put it on desk or hang it on you neck outdoor. The base includes a phone holder design, which is convenient for you to place your phone and watch movies and videos coolly.

❅ Powerful Wind - 5 Modes ❅ Built-in optimal copper DC motor, effectively reduce carbon brush friction noise, Pluralla portable fan provides 5 different wind speeds for you. You can simply press the power button to switch the wind setting, from weak to strong, powerful and quick enough to cool you down no matter indoor or outdoor. Special Note: In order to protect the motor to extend the service life and save energy, the fan will automatically shut down after continuous using for 4 hours.

❅ 4000mAh Rechargeable & USB-C Charging ❅ This mini fan built in 4000mAh rechargeable battery that can provide you up to 9-16 hours of continuous working time. Comes with the USB-C charging cable, you can charge it for about 4-5H by the regular socket, power bank, computer, etc.

❅ Smart LED Digital Display ❅ The digital display shows the gears that you choose and the real time power percentage which reminds you the time to charge. Digital display design, easy to check the power consumption at any time. Help you keep everything in control.

❅ Ideal Gift Choice & Packing List ❅ The designed out-looking is unique that would be an ideal gift for stylish girls, boys, men, women and kids. It's an ideal partner in such hot summer to keep you cool when traveling, waiting in line or doing sports. Package includes: 1 x Mini Portable Hand-held Fan; 1x Detachable Lanyard; 1x Stable Base; 1x USB A-C Cable; 1 x User Manual; 1 x Aromatherapy Tablet; 12-month Manufacture Warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pluralla Mini Portable Fan Noted Before Purchase: 1. There're 5 speed modes. But the 5th gear is not the strongest. It's from weak to strong, and then strong to weak, circulating wind. 2. In order to protect motor and save energy, the fan will automatically shut down after continuous using for 4 hours. Turn it on as you like.

Two Colors for You to Choose! Pink Packing List: 1 x Mini Portable Hand-held Fan; 1x Detachable Lanyard; 1x Stable Base; 1x USB A-C Cable; 1 x User Manual; 1 x Aromatherapy Tablet Navy Blue Packing List: 1 x Mini Portable Hand-held Fan; 1x Detachable Lanyard; 1x Stable Base; 1x USB A-C Cable; 1 x User Manual; 1 x Aromatherapy Tablet

LED Digital Display Clear digital display indicates the power level, allowing you to know the remaining power when outdoor activity. USB-C Fast Charging Charging Time: 4-5 Hours Working Time: 9-16 Hours USB-C Charging cable ensures you a fast and save charging process. Optimal Copper Motor Built-in optimal copper DC motor, effectively reduce carbon brush friction noise, Pluralla personal fan gives you a quiet but cooling experience. Stable Standing Base Detachable base is included, don't worry about tipping over, perfect for your desk, next to a table. The base includes a phone holder design.
Previous page 90° Rotation to cool you at work Enjoy the quiet cooling moment Cool You All the Summer Portable to Go Anywhere with You Next page 1 At Work 2 At Home 3 Outdoor 4 Shopping

How to use the fan? You can simply press the power button to switch the wind setting, from weak to strong. At any mode, long press the power button to turn off the fan. How is the wind? There are 5 speed modes. Speed 1: Sleep Mode / Speed 2: Natural Wind / Speed 3: Refreshing Wind / Speed 4: Strongest Wind / Speed 5: Circulating Wind What does it mean by circulating air for the 5th speed? The 5th speed is circulating air, means the wind from low speed to high speed, and make cycle. Can I use it while it is charging? Yes, it can be used while charging. How does the digital display work? When you turn on the fan, it will display the wind setting, and then switch to the battery reminder. When it is charging, the led screen will display current power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Battery life is great I wear it around my neck. I use it while walking and playing chair volleyball as I am a senior so no jumping around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best fan I use
reviews.reviewText: I have several handheld fans and this is my fave. It isn’t as noisy as the other ones. It lasts a long time on a charge. Robust air which is what I was looking for!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my kids. They like it & its a strong lil fan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it Works Great
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for on the go or if you happen to get hot after doing chores and just need a quick breeze to cool down. I love it and even use the holder on my desk. Perfect for when you have hot flashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best design for a hand-held fan. In reality, only 4 speeds.
reviews.reviewText: The Pluralla personal fan with the fixed fan blades behind a grid cage, I have found, is the best style of handheld fan if you're looking for effective wind/cooling speed & fairly quiet operation. This fan came with an 86% charge, easily viewable on the small digital screen, which is also where the fan speed number shows up. The power/speed increase button is located just under the digital screen. This fan advertises 5 speeds; in reality, there's only 4 that are useful. 1 being the lowest, 2 more speed, up to 4, which is highest. You'd think 5 would be fastest speed, but it isn't. It's, as far as I can figure out, a "variable" speed and goes from 1 to 2 to 1 to 3 to 1, etc. I don't know what use that will be b/c if I'm using a Hand Held Fan, I'm perfectly capable of adjusting the speed myself. So IMO, this 5th speed is a waste, I'm removing a star for that sillyness. This fan comes with an aroma-tablet in a sealed foil bag & there are instructions for proper insertion into the fan. No indication what the scent is, brand name or any way to order more if you want.You'll find a small stand for the fan so it will stand, upright, on it's own & there's a grove for your phone. Neat idea. The fan itself tilts back so you can fine tune the direction. There's also a lanyard included so you can wear the fan around your neck & enjoy it that way. It really is versatile. Another feature that makes this fixed blade behind a grid cage style more desirable is there's less chance of getting your hair caught in the blades. The collapsible fans even come with a warning sticker about getting hair caight in the fan blades. The charges on these last quite awhile & recharge via USB pretty quickly. This unit can also be used to charge your phone or another item w/a USB connection.I've tried a few different styles of handheld fans, looking for the one I like best & this style is the one to stick with. My favorite so far has 6 speeds, each increasingly stronger until #6, which feels comparable to a plug in fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that it folds and the quality in the speed is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool!! I’m a fan!!
reviews.reviewText: Came well packed and even the power button had a little cushion around it to avoid depression during transit.Nice fan, especially as its rechargeable. Although I haven’t tried it, I understand that the USB C port is both input and OUTPUT for charging (input) AND alternatively for charging your phone at a pinch from the power storage in the fan battery.To that end there is also a little stand supplied so you can place the fan on a flat surface and, if charging your phone, there is a slot in the stand for holding it while charging.Regarding the current charge, the display provides LED readout of the charge level in percentage. (For the record mine came 81% full). It happens for a short time following each “power mode” selection with the aforementioned button.In terms of function, it’s easy to use. Each press of the power button provides the next level of fan speed and a short readout of level. There are 4 increasing levels and a fifth press will invoke a special mode which cycles through each of the 4 in quick succession with a couple of seconds between each: 1,2,3,4,1,2…etc. You get the idea. If you do, let me know cos I’m not sure what purpose this serves but hey, why not?The speeds are mild to strong so a good range for whatever you need at the time. A 2 second hold of the power button at any time (I think the instructions say 5) will power off the unit. Fan is comfortable to hold but has a lanyard which can be attached to each side of the fan and the fan can then be worn around the neck. Plus, since the fan head itself can move at 90 degrees from its base (essentially the handle) you can position the fan whilst hanging from your neck, to target you in different ways, neck, face etc. Hands free fanning. The lanyard fooled me for a while as to how to attach it before that aha moment when I realized that the 2 ends of the lanyard can be detached, tied to the fan and then reattached to the rest of the lanyard for easy attachment. Don’t worry if that means nothing now, it’ll be helpful at the time you do it. If you’ve seen this type of lanyard before unlike me, you’ll not need this.Instructions are not the greatest but not enough to take a star off and to be fair the seller got back to a question I had pretty quickly and suggested they were looking to improve some of the wording. The issue wasn’t about the function because, well, there’s not much to say about that. It was more to do with the use of the word ‘accessories’, the inclusion of a battery under that heading and the false impression it gave that a replacement rechargeable battery was available. It isn’t. But that’s fine.All in all a great fan for the coming summer!Hope you found this helpful!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small fan
reviews.reviewText: This fan is really great as a personal fan. It kicks out much more fan power than I was expecting, and helps quite a bit in cooling, especially for hot flashes.The stand holds it, so could be used at a desk. It does come with a strap making it hands free.There are five settings - four are increasing intensities, and the fifth setting runs through the previous 4 intervals. I do like how the display shows not only what setting you are on, but then displays the battery percentage.

Fan has one major and two minor flaws. The first and biggest is its only compatible with old USB-A to USB-C cables. So if you have switched over to C to C charging you will have to carry an additional old style brick and cable for this fan. Next, the fan is very weak even at its highest setting (which is 4 not 5 by the way). I have much smaller fans that blow way harder. Last is continuing with size, it doesn’t fold back itself like most fans this size. It takes up too much space in my bag to be as weak as it is.
